content: on 11 sts in white on 3 25mm needles row 1 ws purl row 2 rs k1 kfb k1 5 times 16 sts row 3 to 7 starting on a ws purl row work 5 row in st st row 8 9 and 10 knit row 11 purl row 12 k2tog 8 times 8 sts row 17 and all foll ws row purl pull through to cast off row 18 k1 k2tog k2 6 times 19 sts row 20 k1 k2tog k1 6 times 13 sts toadstool cap row 22 k1 k2tog 6 times 7 sts make 1 start at the bottom cast on 11 sts in white on 3 25mm needles pull through to cast off row 1 ws purl row 2 rs kfb 10 times k1 21 sts large leaf make 2 start at the base cast on 4 sts in green on row 3 purl 3 25mm needles row 4 k1 kfb 10 times k1 31 sts row 1 knit break the white working yarn and join red for the row 2 k1 kfb 2 times k1 6 sts top of the toadstool row 3 knit row 5 6 and 7 purl row 4 k1 kfb knit to the last 2 sts kfb k1 8 sts row 8 to 15 starting on a rs knit row work 8 row in st st row 5 to 8 repeat row 3 and 4 twice more 12 sts row 16 k1 k2tog k3 6 times 25 sts row 9 10 and 11 knit 12 sts woodland tales mobile copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 8 of 10 row 12 k1 k2tog knit to the last 3 sts k2tog k1 making up 10 sts ⇨ note use mattress stitch for seaming and use row 13 knit the photos for reference row 14 to 17 repeat row 12 and 13 twice more 6 sts raccoon row 18 k1 k2tog 2 times k1 4 sts body sew the side edges decrease and stuff the seam row 19 knit runs down the back of the body gather the cast on sts decrease at the base row 20 k2tog 2 times 2 sts head insert the toy safety eyes sew the side row 21 knit edges decrease and stuff this seam runs down the row 22 k2tog 1 stitch underside gather the cast on sts decrease embroider pull through to cast off the nose in black yarn sew the underside of the head onto the cast off edge of the body tail sew the side edges decrease add stuffing and sew small leaf the cast on edge onto the back of the body make 6 start at the base cast on 2 sts in green on 3 25mm needles ears fold in half and sew the side edges onto the head row 1 knit row 2 kfb 2 times 4 sts fox row 3 knit body head & tail make up as per the raccoon row 4 k1 kfb 2 times k1 6 sts instructions
